prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

The future of software development is shifting towards writing applications in plain human languages (e.g., English, French) that are executable by both humans and machines, enabled by advancements in large language models (LLMs) like GPT or Claude.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
